lender.name: Anna Ryden
lender.whereabouts: Barra da Tijuca Rio de Janeiro
lender.loan_because: I hope that KIVA loans can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: thousand different projects...

lender.name: aires
lender.loan_because: To invest in products of better quality
lender.occupational_info: My desktop is where I call to get the products of nutrition internal and external, for the benefit of health.

lender.name: Merete
lender.loan_because: I belive this works!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to give back!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Help and Hope are essential.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: Over the years I have been given "breaks" in life. Just returning the favors given me.
lender.occupational_info: A means to an end. I work my current job in hopes of reaching my dreams. I hope those I help are doing the same, reaching for their dreams.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I think this is a perfect way to help our fellow beings
lender.occupational_info: Administration

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: it would be great, if people could improve their life with a little help ...

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: ERIN
lender.loan_because: IT MAKES ME FEEL GOOD HELPING OTHER PEOPLE. WE ALL NEED EACH OTHER.

lender.name: The Hill Family
lender.loan_because: We decided as a family to make a loan and follow the progress. We are lucky in our lives, and want to do something to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Worldwide traveler assistance.

lender.name: Schmidtgall
lender.loan_because: We want to help others

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I cant loan. I need to have someone pay off my educational loans. Is there anybody to help me?

lender.name: Ed M
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in how the micro lending business works
lender.occupational_info: Chair the Board of a local philanthropic organization focused on early childhood development programs

lender.name: Rowells
lender.loan_because: Once upon a time I needed an education so that I could support my family. At that time many people supported me and now it is my turn to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: Mom is a nurse that explains to people how to get healthier.

lender.name: Karlyn & Arun
lender.loan_because: We hope to give others the opportunity to achieve their goals and make their businesses successful.
lender.occupational_info: Arun helps struggling businesses reorganize, plan their debt repayment, and stay open. Karlyn teaches English to immigrants.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about the opportunity to help people make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work with photos and help give them the "WOW" factor with my design templates.

lender.name: Sean
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Intensive Care Unit at the biggest hospital in my large city. Using high technology and invasive monitoring techniques, I care for extremely ill patients. My patient population includes: medical, surgical, trauma, burns. My department takes only the sickest patients in the city! It's endlessly challenging and rewarding.

lender.name: Pierce
lender.loan_because: I am compelled to do my part to support others, to give them opportunities and tools to improve their lives and the lives of others in whatever way I can. I have great faith in the indomitable human spirit and trust that by giving just a little, the world will gain a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an investment banking firm specializing in raising institutional or angel capital for small to medium sized businesses involved in everything from health care to alternative energy to movie production. I also do non-profit work for the Amani Childrens Foundation, which specializes in providing the best practice and care for children orphaned by HIV/AIDS in Kenya.

lender.name: RenKonsult AS
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people directly, and microfinance is an excellent way to achieve this.
lender.occupational_info: We are a cleaning company in Arendal. We support internationally through KIVA and locally (arendal) through the woman crisis centre

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:35
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students. My job ranges from helping students work through difficult situation at home or in their personal lives, as well as assisting them in choosing classes, goal setting, career planning, etc.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a fair chance at creating a livelihood.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me $50.00 to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses keep track of their finances, and pay their employees and taxes.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to extend a helping hand -- to give someone a hand up, instead of a hand out. Exactly what our society needs!

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at St. Anselm College.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: There are few things more satisfying in life than helping others help themselves. With Kiva there is a direct connection to the people we help and, unlike giving to charities, we might get our money back and experience the pleasure of giving all over again.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help toward a world with independent women!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I find personnel for corporations.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our duty to do something to leave the world in a better place each day. This is my way of catching up.

lender.name: French Family
lender.loan_because: its our small part in improving global conditions
lender.occupational_info: Develop & build wind farms for a greener world

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: It is nice to know that I can help even if it is just a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I work for large and small companies to make videos to promote or showcase their services. We also make videos that companies give to news outlets for T.V.

lender.name: Chris and Helen
lender.loan_because: something so small to us can be so big to others.
lender.occupational_info: network engineering

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because: If my money can provide opportunities for someone to achieve their goals/dreams and improve their life then it's money justly given.
lender.occupational_info: I do tour accounting for a company in the music industry.

lender.name: giancarlo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Arielle
lender.loan_because: we are all connected, and I feel its my responsibility to share my resources. I'm so thankful for everything I've been given, and I hope that other people are as well.
lender.occupational_info: In the city I live in, there are many homeless people. I'm work specifically with young people, because I'm young, and it might be easier for me to have a strong connection with them. I help our clients find resources, go to doctors appointments, fill out paper work, and go on recreational field trips. I also help find resources for drug and alcohol recovery, because that is a major problem in the homeless community.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: My Aunt and Uncle got me started with a gift certificate for Christmas in 2007. I love getting updates about the success of kiva patrons.
lender.occupational_info: I play soccer for the new professional women's soccer league (WPS) in the United States.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: People have taken chances with me by giving loans to grow my business and I in turn feel I should do the same.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love

lender.name: mat
lender.loan_because: i want people to think i'm benevolent and generous with the good fortune i have been afforded in the this, the first world.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a mechanic in a small town with one other guy in an even smaller garage. we live day by day off whatever money we can make.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help other people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My team make websites better.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.occupational_info: I work for a weather forecasting organisation. I help put our information on the Internet and mobile phones. My job is to help everyone use our weather information to make decisions about their businesses, their jobs and their lives.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: the greatest thing you can do is help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I study Social/Cultural Anthropology at university. I've always been interested how different people do different things all around the world. I'd like to do whatever part I can in helping us all come to some understanding and appreciation for one another.

lender.name: Raphaël
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to use the internet for such an objective. I hope Kiva-like initiatives will spread for wealth-sharing, the way Wikipedia does for human knowledge sharing.
lender.occupational_info: My work consists in training small businesses on adapted information and communication technologies (ICT), to increase their efficiency.

lender.name: Leighton
lender.loan_because: I don't have time, so I give from the resource I do have.
lender.occupational_info: I help some immigration lawyers keep their office in good condition.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: We believe that when you put goodness out into the world, it will come back to you later. We also believe that everyone in the world should have a chance to make a difference.

lender.name: margot
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of resources to change lives.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and I choose to give to others from that.
lender.occupational_info: I am deciding what I would like to do. I want to live a life that makes me happy so I am seeing what types of jobs make me happy before I choose one.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to help themselves with a hand up so they are better able to support themselves and I believe we are so blessed in Canada that we should give back in some way. We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office doing accounting in finance

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage creative people all over the world, and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work with troubled youth in a school, now I am involved in church work in a parish.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing terribly special...

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I do research for a law firm, but I would rather be painting. Or sitting on the beach!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: ...it seemed like a good idea at the time :-)
lender.occupational_info: Consumer Promotions Management

lender.name: Ewa
lender.loan_because: I am delighted that the money goes directly to the budding enterpreneurs in the developing world who are not able to get finance from other sources. The act of lending as opposed to a charitable donation is a statement of trust and empowerement. I think Kiva is a great set up to facilitate this process. And of course small amounts can make a big difference to lives of others. We are all one global village now and the act of lending brings people in diverse cultures toghether.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the City of London dealing with large liabilty claims

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a better world

lender.name: Bebe Confort COIMBRA
lender.loan_because:
Good ideas deserve a chance.
As boas ideias merecem uma oportunidade.
lender.occupational_info:
BÉBÉ CONFORT COIMBRA is a baby store located in Coimbra, Portugal, which offers car seats, strollers, nursery furniture and maternity clothes.
BÉBÉ CONFORT COIMBRA é uma loja de produtos para bebé, situada em Coimbra, Portugal, que comercializa carrinhos de bebé, cadeirinhas, móveis, roupa de grávida e outros artigos.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: Deep down we all have a desire to help others - this is just one way I like to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am simply passing on some of the blessings God has given me - let Him have the glory.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: My fiancee and I would like to ask our guests of our upcoming wedding to make donations with Kiva rather than registering for personal gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I forecast stock and currency markets, and my wife, Tracee, is a first grade schoolteacher.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.occupation: student, dreamer, lover of friends & family
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.occupational_info: I ride and show my horse (Spot) when I'm not studying Chemistry and Spanish.

lender.name: Trinh
lender.loan_because: the engine has to start somehow.
lender.occupational_info: just making a minor difference in the larger world. But if everyone does it, wouldn't that be major?

lender.name: Tori
lender.occupational_info: I help students find information. I teach students how to find and use information from books and Internet sources. Teach staff and students how to useWEB 2.0

lender.name: Nathalie & François
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to live on their own, the way they want.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: I truly understand the hardships of entrepreneurship. I respect those that are willing and have the ambition to start their own business and I want to help them in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I own a cafe that serves coffee, sandwiches, soup and beer along with a few other things. I also rent bicycles out for people to ride around town.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Thanks to organizations like Kiva, a little actually can go a long way.

lender.name: Tanjung Jusuf
lender.loan_because: i want to help other people, so that they can help other too.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea, and it really makes it easy to help a lot of people. I feel like I make a difference.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am a recovering entrepreneur and want to support the entrepreneurial community.
lender.occupational_info: I provide information through the internet.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: Everyone must have a fair chance at achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I write inspirational books on education, philosophy, and diversity. I also write short fiction.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: My donation can make a direct difference. I can see the result.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in low light portraiture which includes concerts, sports and events.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: The McMiley Foundation
lender.loan_because: I was blessed with so much and want others to experience a marvelous life.

lender.name: KAUBAU
lender.loan_because: I want to make a "small" difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Julianna
lender.loan_because: I'm a lifelong volunteer, and extremely mission-driven!
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a mom who cares about others and is sometimes in a position to help!

lender.name: Marli
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are struggling or aiming to lose weight. I help keep their motivations high & show them that they *CAN* lose weight!

lender.name: Whitehills Kiva Club
lender.occupational_info: We are a primary school class consisting of 25 ten and eleven year old boys and girls.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I like to think I contribute in my own small way to other peoples quality of life
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the iside operations of the business, thus allowing the business managers to focus on the outside world, comfortable that fulfillment of their due dates will not be a problem

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at least one time in his life. When you can help, don't hesitate, do it!
lender.occupational_info: I plan with a team all mechanicals, electricals,... interventions to keep factory equipment in good condition.

lender.name: jetty from holland
lender.loan_because: it is such an easy way to change lives tremendously!
lender.occupational_info: I love kids therefor I am a babysitter for my profession.

lender.name: syta
lender.loan_because: i think after all my experiences abroad it is the best way to help people to achieve their goals or to upgrade their life!

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: It is illogical for me not to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Coming from a developing country, I am acutely aware that poverty is widespread and I was lucky to be born into a well-to-do family there. I want to help others who're less fortunate, particularly those who're trying to build small business enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: Developed enterprise software system. Currently going for full time master study.

lender.name: Lillian & Bengt
lender.loan_because: We want to help espesially women to get a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: I am eager to give an assist to people who are interested in making a living through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to teach wonderful students how to read well, how to write well, but most importantly, how to THINK well.

lender.name: Brian Niles
lender.loan_because: The joy of giving and making a positive difference in the lives of others is the least I can do given the blessings and abundance I enjoy on a daily basis. I thank God for my ability to assist.
lender.occupational_info: I have a real estate practice through which I help people buy and/or sell homes and property in and around Victoria, British Columbia, Canada

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: In the US, we live in an environment of excess, a throwaway culture. I want to help out people in other countries in a tangible way !
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team that manages websites for a global cosmetics company.

lender.name: lavonne
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to see other people succeed, live the dream, nothing is out of reach!
lender.occupational_info: Suppliers of giant tires for the mining and construction industry.

lender.name: Roz
lender.loan_because: In 2010, I am donating on behalf of Prince Edward County's International Women's Day celebration "Birthing Dreams: Investing in Women," which raised money for Kiva projects.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Prosperity consciousness is giving consciousness.

lender.name: ncds3
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: If i didn't loan, I would probably spend the money on something I don't need. This way I feel I can actually help someone

lender.name: Kamma Narasimha Rao
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing and helping others to improve their lives

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: creating balance in the world is the only way to achieve peace.

lender.name: Karen & Delfine!
lender.loan_because: we love, care, and support other humans trying to make their way on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: Delfine & myself are both working actors in Hollywood, Ca. See: David Lynch & Alex Cox's soon to be released; REPO CHICK. Del is a lead and Karen has Co-Star billing.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: We all depend upon each other for a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to study the environment so I can make a positive contribution to a sustainable planet.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Giving a hand up beats giving a hand out every time.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: We cannot rely solely on the work of large organizations to invest in the future of humanity. It's up to each of us, individually, to demonstrate our compassion, generosity, and interconnectedness in immediate and direct ways with those struggling to build better lives. These are not hand-outs, they're help-ups.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: God's love for me is reflected in my compassion for others.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people settle legal disputes amicably.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I go to University of Wisconsin - Madison and I am in the Army part-time

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Its fun.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I want to stablish my own design studio company.
lender.occupational_info: I see myself in a work culture that is stimulating, where I can grow and be challenged, in a company that values customer relations, also be associated with a professional team and be responsible for positive impact on organisational growth.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I've seen first-hand microcredit's amazing power to help people lift themselves and each other out of extreme poverty.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people do the things they really want to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor because I have a passion for the human body and I am fasicinated by people and the world we live in as well.

lender.name: viji
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference

lender.name: Isaiah
lender.loan_because: I use my birthday and Christmas money to help other people around the world.

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: It's amazing how far just a little bit of money can go in a developing country.
lender.occupational_info: My work focuses on helping others discover their spiritual selves. Kiva enables me to help in more concrete ways.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to see entrepeneurs in other parts of the world have the opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an experienced senior corporate executive having a second career as a novelist.

lender.name: Wiley & Debbie
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed. It's a privilege to help others and shares God's blessings to them.
lender.occupational_info: We perform music for children, schools, families, all ages...styles include jazz, blues, classical and rock.

lender.name: Candice Lee
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can help female entrepreneurs become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: to quote Bill Gates' mother in a letter to Melinda days before their marriage "From those to whom much is given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: I work for Coastguard in New Zealand as a fundraiser.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: Empowerment and opportunity are the way to offer hope. A helping hand is stronger than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Diplomacy

lender.name: Robin & Eddie
lender.loan_because: We are truly blessed and would like to help others who are not as fortunate. We really like the idea that these loans help people become self sufficient and independent.
lender.occupational_info: We work for an international computer company that develops software for businesses and individuals.

lender.name: Albert Muzaurieta
lender.loan_because: its fun to contribute to small growing businesses that need a small amount of capital.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: it helps

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I help keep Google running.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that funds mortgage loans.

lender.name: Casey
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health care consulting firm which helps hospitals improve patient care and revenue cycle management.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: I have been in struggling situations myself and have fortunatley had family come to my rescue to help me back on my feet so I could better myself and make a better life for myself and two beautiful daughters. Though it may not be a lot that I can give to help someone in need, I want to do what I can to help them reach their dream, put a smile on their face!

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: To make a difference.

lender.name: Brigid
lender.loan_because: it's the most hands on way to see how my contribution is being used

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I like to finance microkredits

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: seems to be a great way to help start business' all over the world

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I create software.

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: Like to help people that could use just that extra nudge to get their life or business on the right track. Best reward is to see someone flourish and then ultimately able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Gilles
lender.loan_because: Enriching people is very uplifting and I believe in making the world a more prosperous place. I am grateful to Kiva for giving me the opportunity to help other people improve their lives.

lender.name: Captulina
lender.loan_because: If my little money can mean big money to someone else and help them start a business, well then that's a miracle to me!
lender.occupational_info: I work Retail for a Beautiful SkinCare Line.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and give people what they need. A lot of people are in need and I want to help.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Hambleton
lender.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs get their businesses off the ground
lender.occupational_info: I invest in startup technology companies in the United States

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am moved by people trying to make a difference and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for a company that makes and sells clothes. I help hire and train people to do that work.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because:
I like to help my people.
Me gusta ayudar a mi gente.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to try to help others, even if I can only do it in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach academic English to college students from around the world.

lender.name: Mabel
lender.loan_because: my mom and I like helping women be strong and able to take care of themselves.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed with a good life. It is important to give back. "What you do to these you do to Me"
lender.occupational_info: I am a family doctor who takes care of people of all ages.My focus is on wellness: keeping healthy

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I like helping the less fortunate.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupation: Managing Director for Alternative Investment Fund
lender.loan_because: micro lending is an important part of fostering economic growth in countries that often have limited access to credit due to conditions outside of the control of the average business person. Having a deep understanding of the way credit markets work, along with a cultural sensitivity, I realize that often the only way for Kiva borrowers to grow their business is to look outside their country for access to credit due to the inefficient and ineffective internal credit market.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: We have incredible fortune and opportunity here. I wish to share just a small portion of that. Those who are given much will be held accountable for much. I am about empowering people, and that is what this site does.
lender.occupational_info: I treat medical disorders of the foot and ankle.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back to my sisters in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer, using my head and my hands 8 hours a day.

lender.name: Mazel
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to have achieved more than I ever dreamed. I want to pass on some of my blessings to others who are less fortunate but no less hard working.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from work but not from an extremely active lifestyle. I am a freeelance travel writer, an ESL tutor, tennis player, skier, and avid reader.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have economic opportunities, I want to help my brothers and sisters around the world.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: As a member of this global community called Earth, I believe in helping your neighbor when you can. "Never look down on anybody unless you're helping him up." -Jesse Jackson

lender.name: Jamie & Luisana
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: Get airplane from point A to point B.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: Kiva empowers me to make a difference. It is inspiring to see what is possible when we work together.

lender.name: Monserrat
lender.loan_because: To help out other women in the world.

lender.name: Sterling Riber
lender.loan_because: We are a group in a Western Washington University class doing a presentation on Kiva and we want to help someone's goals succeed.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to prove that one individual, one solitary person can make a tangible difference in our world. I refuse to let cynicism stand in my way.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching and supporting the medical community as a technical analyst for a health care provider

lender.name: Scott & Anna
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of being able to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. These opportunities to change someone's life come at a small cost to us -- the expense of a dinner out or a DVD unpurchased. They make a great difference to those who want to improve their lives - and the lives of their family and communities.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it's a more direct and personal way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I program and monitor satellite science instruments to observe how the Earth and its atmosphere interact and to study how this affects the health of our planet and our quality of life.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.

lender.name: jeannie
lender.loan_because: i feel grateful for the security i have in my life and i want to help others feel more secure in their lives
lender.occupational_info: i take care of my kids and i work. i work with people to help show them how to save money on their healthcare expenditures

lender.name: Maddie
lender.loan_because: I care about your life!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student

lender.name: Gil
lender.loan_because: God moves me to help.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.occupation: Retired United Church of Canada Diaconal Minister

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help those in need. I want to let them know that we do care. It is just a great way to make an impact on someone's life. I'm very excited to know about this website, because I believe in life and hope! One small step at a time to achieve our goals in this world :D
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and work to pay for my tuition. Even though I am a college student and do not earn as much, I can still save some of my money and help others to improve their lives. Pay it forward! Thank you :D

lender.name: Tom Fitzpatrick
lender.loan_because:
Micro-Lending is a hand up and not simply a hand out. The free market offers the emerging world the best path toward prosperity and a bright future shaped by their own dreams and ambitions. KIVA offers me a direct one to one relationship with an entrepreneur some where else on the planet.
My students in my SIFE Chapter and my International Business class have made over 400 loans to 40+ countries the past two years and I am very proud of them!
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of International Business and Marketing.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to see entrepreneurs prosper in third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites that provide businesses new ways to flourish--like Kiva.org.

lender.name: Tatiana
lender.loan_because: To me $25 is a cute pair of shoes or a couple songs on iTunes! But for someone else across the world that means money for a new house! Or money to rebuild a school! Or money to EAT! Even money for a new business! Even though I will probably never meet these people I want to help make a difference in SOMEONES life! Even if 1 life is the only I can get to before I die...I want to know the world was a better place because of me! $25.00 at a time... I can change the world.

lender.name: Amin
lender.loan_because: All deserve to dream, and make our dreams come true ...

lender.name: Sudeep Dhillon
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of leveraging Entrepreneurs to improve the quality of life of the individual and hope that their business creates additional employment in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large international bank and have held positions in lending and credit and undersand the power of micro-lending and what it can do to create opportunities for hard working, enterprising and ethical individuals.

lender.name: Branksome Hall Kiva Club
lender.loan_because: We want to help the world one business at a time.

lender.name: Phoebe
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: positive karma is always a good thing to have on your side.

lender.name: Shinyasu
lender.loan_because: Now, I'm starting new business. I'd like to contribute others.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: I borrow

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: A small action that can make a large difference in enabling people to take control of their lives.

lender.name: Stacie
lender.loan_because: no interest loans offer a great way to fund small business that can have big impact to the owner, their family and their community!
lender.occupational_info: I buy, manage and sell office, industrial and retail real estate.

lender.name: Lauren and Saul
lender.loan_because: it was a wonderful gift idea for our wedding that allows us to continuely reinvest in the potential of people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide assistance and educational tools to community relations and environment practitioners in our organisation to help them implement our commitments to corporate social responsibilty.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Economic Self-sufficiency is one of the pillars to reduce suffering, domestic violence, trafficking and powerlessness, and improve families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur, Community Volunteer, Leader, Mentor

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle to raise a family. I can't think of anything more worthy than helping someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I currently have a very routine, low-paying job, but I working towards my dreams of a better life through a better job.

lender.name: Jaya
lender.loan_because: the disparities in the world are too great and have been created through past and current injustices.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: If I needed seed money to start up or expand my small business that was essential to supporting my family, I would hope that someone might be willing to invest in me.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to be independent from men. In so many countries women and girls are still worth less than men and to change that, women need to be able to earn enough money not to have to rely on men.

lender.name: Ivo
lender.loan_because:
Stimulating entrepreneurship is the only aid that will improve welfare in the long run.
I am happy that I can make a small contribution.

lender.name: YayMicro.com
lender.loan_because: We lend because we are entrepreneurs and want to help other entrepreneurs. We also appreciate the opportunity to help others help themselves, and to try to make the world a little bit better. Yaymicro.com encourage all their contributors and customers to join us here at Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: We run a microstock agency, selling images and illustrations.

lender.name: Andrew, Wendy & Karina
lender.loan_because: It's good to be able to help others in need and is a valuable lesson to our daughter in community values.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the power of microloans and how programs like Kiva can change lives in a powerful, sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I create and lead companies that build value for all participants -- employees, shareholders, clients and managers.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help lots of people around the world. the beauty of Kiva work is to make it possible by joint actions from thousands of people all over the world. I'm proud to be part of them.
lender.occupational_info: I help scientists to bring their inventions gto the market. By doing so, we are crossing the bridge between science and society, bringing real benefits, jobs and wealth to the world.

lender.name: marian
lender.loan_because: I have respect for people who start a business and I will be more than happy to invest!!
lender.occupational_info: I buy products for a big store. I travel and go to different places to select the merchandise.

lender.name: Venus
lender.loan_because: You are Me... we are eternally connected by love, life and the will to prosper. I will blessings upon all righteous things you desire.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: its fun

lender.name: Shamal
lender.loan_because: Sometimes, it's easy to think that making a difference is too difficult or even impossible but KIVA makes it so easy.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies identify how their HR department can be more efficient and help them achieve their desired state by implementing new systems, redesigning processes, designing org structures and providing strategic recommendations.

lender.name: bellur
lender.loan_because: It is the only way to make the world a little better for others. I strongly believe in sharing my fortunes with others less fortunate. I am glad that finally I found a place where I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pediatrician in practice for the last 31 years. I am trying to make a difference in a child"s life one at a time.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and make a difference. It says in the bible when you give it will come back 10 fold
lender.occupational_info: I help special needs individuals live full and active lives. I make sure that they are not abused or taken advantage of. I help ensure their health and a good quality of life

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to give entrepreneurial people a chance to succeed.

lender.name: J Scott
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in helping to design security for ATMs

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I create software for computers.

lender.name: Anoj
lender.loan_because: what the poor need is an opportunity not charity

lender.name: Vita
lender.loan_because: those who are deserving deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to support people - especially women - who are trying to earn a living under very difficult circumstances

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it's really cool.
lender.occupational_info: I help smart people work smarter.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: To me, investing in the future is the best investment.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because:
This was a gift from someone who makes me want to be a better person. She runs a business that sells Detox Foot Pads so please check her out if your interested
http://www.purifyyourbody.com/

lender.name: Virginia & Tony
lender.loan_because: Individuals who share good will and mutual interests are our best hope for a world without war.
lender.occupational_info: We each worked more than 35 years for government helping people find jobs, collect jobless benefits, and understand the labor market.
